refnamediv.refpurpose: defines a hashable object that uniquely identifies a bibliographic entry.

refsect2.title: self.key
refsect2.para: Holds the reference of the entry inside its database

refsect2.title: self.base
refsect2.para: Holds the reference of the database entry.

refsect2.title: __init__ (self, database, key)
refsect2.para: Creates a new key holding the specified database and entry keys.
